WorkItem.ClosedComment: Refer to win.ts in this sample - it references files (via a relative path) from the 'typings' folder that are part of a full TypeScript enlistment. You'll need to either fix those paths up manually (after downloading winrt.d.ts and winjs.d.ts) or build the sample from a full TypeScript enlistment. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
I get this error:

Error	1	The command ""C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\0.8.0.0\tsc" -target ES5 "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\data.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\default.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\groupDetailPage.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\groupedItemsPage.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\itemDetailPage.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\navigator.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\topic.ts" "D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\js\win.ts"" exited with code 1.	D:\Desktop\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\Encyclopedia.jsproj	108	5	Encyclopedia
